Articles.Content: I'm sure I'm not the first person to do this, if someone can figure out how to do it without mechjeb then props, but SAS didn't seem to hold it straight.

That is really cool and actually looks like something jeb might strap a SRB to (thats a compliment)

The one thing that bugs me is that you say it is stock then letters latter in the thread name contradict it by saying it has mods.

Not the first; far from the first.
